LanguageData.Make_Wort.label: make wort
LanguageData.ExciseCarcinoma.label: excise carcinoma
LanguageData.CureScaria.label: cure scaria
LanguageData.CureScaria.description: This special medical operation cures scaria.
LanguageData.Sterilize.label: sterilize
LanguageData.Sterilize.description: Sterilize a creature so it can no longer reproduce.
LanguageData.InstallArchotechEye.label: install archotech eye
LanguageData.InstallArchotechArm.label: install archotech arm
LanguageData.InstallArchotechLeg.label: install archotech leg
LanguageData.InstallBionicEye.label: install bionic eye
LanguageData.InstallBionicArm.label: install bionic arm
LanguageData.InstallBionicLeg.label: install bionic leg
LanguageData.InstallBionicSpine.label: install bionic spine
LanguageData.InstallBionicHeart.label: install bionic heart
LanguageData.InstallBionicStomach.label: install bionic stomach
LanguageData.InstallDeathAcidifier.label: install death acidifier
LanguageData.InstallBionicEar.label: install bionic ear
LanguageData.InstallPegLeg.label: install peg leg
LanguageData.InstallWoodenHand.label: install wooden hand
LanguageData.InstallWoodenFoot.label: install wooden foot
LanguageData.InstallDenture.label: install denture
LanguageData.InstallNaturalHeart.label: install heart
LanguageData.InstallNaturalLung.label: install lung
LanguageData.InstallNaturalKidney.label: install kidney
LanguageData.InstallNaturalLiver.label: install liver
LanguageData.InstallSimpleProstheticLeg.label: install prosthetic leg
LanguageData.InstallSimpleProstheticArm.label: install prosthetic arm
LanguageData.InstallSimpleProstheticHeart.label: install prosthetic heart
LanguageData.InstallCochlearImplant.label: install cochlear implant
LanguageData.InstallPowerClaw.label: install power claw
LanguageData.InstallJoywire.label: install joywire
LanguageData.InstallPainstopper.label: install painstopper
LanguageData.RemovePainstopper.label: remove painstopper
LanguageData.ButcherCorpseFlesh.label: butcher creature
LanguageData.ButcherCorpseFlesh.description: Butcher a creature to obtain its meat, leather, and other body products.
LanguageData.ButcherCorpseMechanoid.label: shred mechanoid
LanguageData.ButcherCorpseMechanoid.description: Shred a dead mechanoid to try to salvage usable material.
LanguageData.SmashCorpseMechanoid.label: smash mechanoid
LanguageData.SmashCorpseMechanoid.description: Smash a dead mechanoid with simple hand tools to salvage usable material.
LanguageData.CremateCorpse.label: cremate corpse
LanguageData.CremateCorpse.description: Cremate a corpse to completely destroy it.
LanguageData.BurnApparel.label: burn apparel
LanguageData.BurnApparel.description: Burn unwanted apparel to completely destroy it.
LanguageData.BurnWeapon.label: burn weapon
LanguageData.BurnWeapon.description: Burn unwanted weapon to completely destroy it.
LanguageData.BurnDrugs.label: burn drugs
LanguageData.BurnDrugs.description: Burn unwanted drugs to completely destroy them.
LanguageData.Make_Kibble.label: make kibble
LanguageData.Make_Kibble.description: Make animal kibble by combining raw meat and plants.
LanguageData.Make_Pemmican.label: make pemmican
LanguageData.Make_Pemmican.description: Make pemmican, a preserved combination of meat and plant food. It doesn't taste amazing, but lasts a long time without refrigeration.
LanguageData.Make_PemmicanBulk.label: make pemmican x4
LanguageData.Make_PemmicanBulk.description: Make bulk pemmican, a preserved combination of meat and plant food. It doesn't taste amazing, but lasts a long time without refrigeration.
LanguageData.CookMealSimple.label: cook simple meal
LanguageData.CookMealSimple.description: Cook a straightforward meal from one ingredient.
LanguageData.CookMealSimpleBulk.label: cook simple meal x4
LanguageData.CookMealSimpleBulk.description: Cook 4 straightforward meals from one ingredient.
LanguageData.CookMealFine.label: cook fine meal
LanguageData.CookMealFine.description: Cook a somewhat complex meal from a combination of meat and plant ingredients.
LanguageData.CookMealFine_Veg.label: cook vegetarian fine meal
LanguageData.CookMealFine_Veg.description: Cook a somewhat complex meal from plant ingredients.
LanguageData.CookMealFine_Meat.label: cook carnivore fine meal
LanguageData.CookMealFine_Meat.description: Cook a somewhat complex meal from meat ingredients.
LanguageData.CookMealFineBulk.label: cook fine meal x4
LanguageData.CookMealFineBulk.description: Cook 4 somewhat complex meals from a combination of meat and plant ingredients. Some of the ingredients are wasted in order to create a good eating experience.
LanguageData.CookMealFineBulk_Meat.label: cook carnivore fine meal x4
LanguageData.CookMealFineBulk_Meat.description: Cook 4 somewhat complex meals from meat ingredients. Some of the ingredients are wasted in order to create a good eating experience. Producing varied flavors with meat alone introduces extra inefficiencies.
LanguageData.CookMealFineBulk_Veg.label: cook vegetarian fine meal x4
LanguageData.CookMealFineBulk_Veg.description: Cook 4 somewhat complex meals from plant ingredients. Some of the ingredients are wasted in order to create a good eating experience. Producing varied flavors with plants alone introduces extra inefficiencies.
LanguageData.CookMealLavish.label: cook lavish meal
LanguageData.CookMealLavish.description: Cook a very complex meal from a combination of meat and plant ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted in order to create the best eating experience.
LanguageData.CookMealLavish_Meat.label: cook carnivore lavish meal
LanguageData.CookMealLavish_Meat.description: Cook a very complex meal from meat ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted in order to create the best eating experience. Producing varied flavors with meat alone introduces extra inefficiencies.
LanguageData.CookMealLavish_Veg.label: cook vegetarian lavish meal
LanguageData.CookMealLavish_Veg.description: Cook a very complex meal from plant ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted in order to create the best eating experience. Producing varied flavors with plants alone introduces extra inefficiencies.
LanguageData.CookMealLavishBulk.label: cook lavish meal x4
LanguageData.CookMealLavishBulk.description: Cook 4 very complex meals from a combination of meat and plant ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted in order to create the best eating experience.
LanguageData.CookMealLavishBulk_Veg.label: cook vegetarian lavish meal x4
LanguageData.CookMealLavishBulk_Veg.description: Cook 4 very complex meals from plant ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted in order to create the best eating experience. Producing varied flavors with plants alone introduces extra inefficiencies.
LanguageData.CookMealLavishBulk_Meat.label: cook carnivore lavish meal x4
LanguageData.CookMealLavishBulk_Meat.description: Cook 4 very complex meals from meat ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted in order to create the best eating experience. Producing varied flavors with meat alone introduces extra inefficiencies.
LanguageData.CookMealSurvival.label: cook packaged survival meal
LanguageData.CookMealSurvival.description: Prepare a packaged survival meal from a combination of meat and plant ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted in the preservation process.
LanguageData.CookMealSurvivalBulk.label: cook packaged survival meal x4
LanguageData.CookMealSurvivalBulk.description: Prepare 4 packaged survival meals from a combination of meat and plant ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted in the preservation process.
LanguageData.Make_StoneBlocksAny.label: make any stone blocks
LanguageData.Make_StoneBlocksAny.description: Cut rock chunks into usable stone blocks.
LanguageData.ExtractMetalFromSlag.label: smelt metal from slag
LanguageData.ExtractMetalFromSlag.description: Use heat and strong electromagnets to extract useful metal from slag chunks.
LanguageData.SmeltWeapon.label: smelt weapon
LanguageData.SmeltWeapon.description: Use heat and strong electromagnets to break down weapons into useful resources.
LanguageData.SmeltApparel.label: smelt apparel
LanguageData.SmeltApparel.description: Use heat and strong electromagnets to break down metallic apparel like armor into useful resources.
LanguageData.DestroyWeapon.label: destroy weapon
LanguageData.DestroyWeapon.description: Use heat to destroy unwanted weapons. This process is faster than smelting, and works on non-smeltable items, but yields no resources.
LanguageData.DestroyApparel.label: destroy apparel
LanguageData.DestroyApparel.description: Use heat to destroy unwanted apparels. This process is faster than smelting, and works on non-smeltable items, but yields no resources.
LanguageData.Make_ChemfuelFromWood.label: make chemfuel from wood
LanguageData.Make_ChemfuelFromWood.description: Make a batch of chemfuel by extracting and condensing wood gas from logs.
LanguageData.Make_ChemfuelFromOrganics.label: make chemfuel from organics
LanguageData.Make_ChemfuelFromOrganics.description: Make a batch of chemfuel by extracting biofuel from organic feedstocks.
LanguageData.Make_ComponentIndustrial.label: make component
LanguageData.Make_ComponentSpacer.label: make advanced component
LanguageData.Make_Patchleather.label: make patchleather
LanguageData.Make_Patchleather.description: Combine various types of leather to create weak patchleather.
LanguageData.Anesthetize.label: anesthetize
LanguageData.Anesthetize.description: Render a creature unconscious by administering general anesthetic.
LanguageData.Euthanize.label: euthanize by cut
LanguageData.RemoveBodyPart.label: remove part
LanguageData.AdministerMechSerumHealer.label: administer healer mech serum
LanguageData.Make_StoneBlocksSandstone.label: make sandstone blocks
LanguageData.Make_StoneBlocksSandstone.description: Cuts sandstone chunks into usable blocks.
LanguageData.Make_StoneBlocksGranite.label: make granite blocks
LanguageData.Make_StoneBlocksGranite.description: Cuts granite chunks into usable blocks.
LanguageData.Make_StoneBlocksLimestone.label: make limestone blocks
LanguageData.Make_StoneBlocksLimestone.description: Cuts limestone chunks into usable blocks.
LanguageData.Make_StoneBlocksSlate.label: make slate blocks
LanguageData.Make_StoneBlocksSlate.description: Cuts slate chunks into usable blocks.
LanguageData.Make_StoneBlocksMarble.label: make marble blocks
LanguageData.Make_StoneBlocksMarble.description: Cuts marble chunks into usable blocks.
